players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice was the one found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our group."
You: "I agree with Charlie. We need to be vigilant and keep a close eye on each other to ensure the mafia doesn't infiltrate our group."
You: "I'm concerned about the recent turn of events and believe we should all share our alibis for last night to put everyone at ease. Let's build trust within our group by being transparent."
Diana: "I support Bob's suggestion for transparency and will share my alibi as well. Last night, I was at home studying for the upcoming village fair quiz competition."

Charlie: "I believe it's important for us to maintain open communication and trust within our group. Last night, I was at the village library working on a research project for the upcoming science fair."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
